title: IP increase shows but doesnt update behind the scene
body: Hey, riot. I've played like 6 or 7 games in a row now and finally had enough to buy the champ i wanted but went I went to buy the champ it said that I only had the amount of IP that I had before those games and therefore didn't have enough to buy the champ. is there a way to fix this or do i just keep playing without getting any IP.

replies.body:
This annoying bug should be resolved by swapping over to the *Legacy Client* from the login screen to complete your purchase:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this worked for you. ^.^
